caption.p: Early cryo-EM image reconstructions of Fab17 ( A) and Fab1 ( B) bound to HRV14 at ~20Å resolution. ( C) Electron density of the 3.5Å crystal structure of the Fab17/HRV14 complex [ 21]. ( D) The ribbon structure of the Fab17/HRV complex. The two Nim-IA escape mutants are highlighted in yellow. ( E) Stereo diagram of the electron density of “pocket factor” (grey) in the Fab17/HRV14 crystal structure that came from the PEG400 used for freezing the crystals. For reference, the WIN 52084 drug [ 10, 12] is shown and also moves the protein strand above the density by more than 3.5Å away from the apo conformation (yellow).
